ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks
Class ChunkRaw

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.ChunkRaw

public class ChunkRaw
extends java.lang.Object

Wraps the raw chunk data Short lived object, to be created while serialing/deserializing Do not reuse it for different chunks see http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/spec/1.2/PNG-Chunks.html
